displayName.text: Danila and Lana's Wedding Photo & Video | New York

formattedAddress: 186 Prince St, New York, NY 10012, USA
adrFormatAddress: 186 Prince St, New York, NY 10012, USA

originalText.text: Danila and his team were absolutely amazing! They did our engagement photos, wedding photos and also wedding video. I will continue to recommend to friends and family! All of the content was exceptional, and we felt so comfortable and natural. Danila and his team really stood out to me because they were able to really represent the day without being a distraction. I have been to MANY weddings and at times I feel like I’m on set  for a movie/photoshoot. This is NOT the case for Danila. 10/10!!!!

originalText.text: Lana and her team did a wonderful job for our wedding, they captured all the specific photos that we had asked for, and even some awesome candids. We fell in love with their color palette! Would highly recommend for your future wedding!

text.text: Lana and her team did a wonderful job for our wedding, they captured all the specific photos that we had asked for, and even some awesome candids. We fell in love with their color palette! Would highly recommend for your future wedding!

originalText.text:
I am OBSESSED with our photos (both wedding & portrait shoot).

I found Danila online through another couple that had been married at our venue (The Foundry LIC). I loved the editorial and romantic style. I was a little hesitant because I love a good first-hand recommendation but couldn’t compare his photos to any other wedding photographer. During our initial conversation it was easy and flowed. He knew our venue (which could have tricky lighting) and got our vision. During our portrait shoot he was able to get to know my husband and I and we were able to get to know him. He made us both super comfortable in front of the camera. When we received our portrait session photos we were blown away..making us so excited for the capturing of the big day!

Danila and his assistant, Liubov, (who was LOVELY) were right on time, easy-going, and got pictures of everything without being pushy or overwhelming. They worked with our big families requests and many personalities. They captured the very best parts of the very best day.

So, THIS IS YOUR FIRST HAND RECOMMENDATION…if you like the style (timeless, classic, romantic, editorial, perfectly edited & perfectly candid) book them now. We are in love with our photos and EVERYONE has made comments about how stunning they are. We cannot thank them enough!

originalText.text: Hiring Danila to photograph our wedding and engagement was the best decision we made. Danila and Lana are photographers that want to take beautiful photos of you and your loved ones even more than you do. Highest praises for them both. They are so fun and easy to work with! Made our most awkward selves look stunning in photographs!

text.text: Hiring Danila to photograph our wedding and engagement was the best decision we made. Danila and Lana are photographers that want to take beautiful photos of you and your loved ones even more than you do. Highest praises for them both. They are so fun and easy to work with! Made our most awkward selves look stunning in photographs!

originalText.text: My wife and I hired Danila and Lana for our wedding elopement then again for our one year anniversary when we celebrated with family and we couldn't be happier with the way the photos turned out for both dates. They do incredible work and were able to capture all the most tender and candid moments from our wedding. Looking back at the photos, we're able to feel the magic of both days all over again. Not only did the photos turn out great but they are so much fun to work with as well and made us feel at ease. Can't thank them enough.
